short_summary: Health Canada - Professional Services Partnership Opportunities
description: Health Canada - Professional Services Partnership Opportunities: We are seeking to establish 1 contract with a period of 3 years. The contract will be for Task based Professional Services. The contract is open to holders of the Task and Solution Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS SA) # E60ZT-18TSPS who qualified under Tier 2.
full_summary:
================================

**Health Canada - Professional Services Partnership Opportunities**

**Tender Reference:** WS3632083855-Doc3632102306

**Publication Date:** September 1, 2022

**Tender Closing Date:** September 21, 2022, 14:00 EDT

**Amendment Date:** September 15, 2022

**Procurement Summary:**

Health Canada is seeking to establish a partnership with a suitable contractor to provide Task-based Professional Services under the Task and Solution Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS SA) # E60ZT-18TSPS.

**Description of Requirement:**

This requirement is open to Task and Solution Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS SA) # E60ZT-18TSPS holders who have qualified under Tier 2. The successful contractor will provide professional services to Health Canada (HC) to support the provision of Health and Wellness initiatives.

**Key Points:**

* The contract period will be from the award date to three years later.
* The contractor must have a pre-existing Task and Solution Professional Services Supply Arrangement (TSPS SA) # E60ZT-18TSPS.
* Canada is seeking to establish 1 contract.
* All bids submitted after the closing date and time will be considered non-responsive.

**Selection Criteria:**

The bid will be evaluated based on the following criteria: Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to suppliers who are part of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)

**Contact Information:**

Please contact Fournel-trepanier, Benoit (SPAC/PSPC) at benoit.fournel-trepanier@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for more information.

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13881869?extsite=MTM4ODE4NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note:
Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on September 21,
